ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Down time
ygData.msgSnippet: ... To quote my brother, That sucks a fatty . That reminds me that not only do I have to wash the dishes today, but I have to fix the network and have the
ygData.messageBody:
> Man this sucks!
>
> My PC crashed hardcore after installing the new Win2k service pack3 and
> now I think I have to send it in! Anyway I finally got my wife's computer
> up and running but unfortunately it doesn't have a 3d vid card in it!
> AAAAAHHHHHHH!!!!! I guess I won't be playing EQ for a while!
>
>
To quote my brother, "That sucks a fatty".
That reminds me that not only do I have to wash the dishes today, but I have
to fix the network and have the house all straightened out before I go to
the airport to pick up my mother. I can't believe 2 weeks passed already..
luv,
-Su
